scoringPlays.text: Alex Wesley 33 Yd pass from Jacob Knipp (Collin Root Kick)
Devin Ross 4 Yd pass from Steven Montez (James Stefanou Kick)
Phillip Lindsay 5 Yd Run (James Stefanou Kick)
Shay Fields 28 Yd pass from Steven Montez (James Stefanou Kick)
Bryce Bobo 29 Yd pass from Steven Montez (James Stefanou Kick)
Alex Wesley 52 Yd pass from Jacob Knipp (Collin Root Kick)
Michael McCauley 27 Yd pass from Jacob Knipp (Collin Root Kick)
Jay MacIntyre 14 Yd pass from Steven Montez (James Stefanou Kick)

videos.headline: Colorado State strikes first with 33-yard TD
videos.description: Bears QB Jacob Knipp finds a wide-open Alex Wesley in the end zone to give Colorado State an early 7-0 lead.

videos.headline: Colorado's Montez connects with Ross for TD
videos.description: Steven Montez rolls to his right and finds Devin Ross at the goal line for a four-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Buffs recover fumble, force turnover on muffed snap
videos.description: After a botched Northern Colorado snap, Colorado's Jacob Callier recovers the ball, giving the Buffaloes great field position.

videos.headline: Lindsay spins into end zone for Colorado TD
videos.description: Phillip Lindsay runs it up the gut and spins past a defender to score from five yards out.

videos.headline: Buffaloes score as WR Bobo dives into end zone
videos.description: Colorado QB Steven Montez finds Bryce Bobo over the middle, and he outruns the defenders to score a 29-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Northern Colorado airs it out for long TD
videos.description: Jacob Knipp throws it deep and connects with Alex Wesley for a 52-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Colorado's Montez picked off near end zone
videos.description: Just before halftime, Stone Kane jumps in front of the receiver to intercept Steven Montez's pass.

videos.headline: Bears' QB Knipp delivers perfect pass for TD
videos.description: Jacob Knipp threads the needle, throwing over two defenders to find Michael McCauley for a 27-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Northern Colorado recovers Colorado fumble
videos.description: Colorado's Michael Adkins II has the ball knocked out of his hands by Sherand Boyd Jr., and Willie Fairman recovers the loose ball for the Bears.

videos.headline: Buffs' Montez threads the needle on 4th TD pass of game
videos.description: Steven Montez throws between four Northern Colorado defenders to complete a pass to Jay MacIntyre in the end zone for a 14-yard touchdown.
